messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning]TCS and other philosophies: was "Hello everyone!"
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/23/04 12:30:16 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... I personally think it is an interesting topic.  Not necessarily TCS specifically, but
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/23/04 12:30:16 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
ikonstitcher@... writes:

> PLEASE change the subject header -- how about "the most boring topic ever
> rehashed on every damned email list I've been on" -- so I can be forewarned
> and delete it.
>
>

I personally think it is an interesting topic. Not necessarily TCS
specifically, but autonomous living, non-coercive parenting, mutually agreed upon
solutions, consensual living. All those types of topics are fascinating to me and
fit in nicely with the topic of unschooling. Not that any one person or
philosophy has "the answers," but they can bring up great questions and thought
provoking discussions.

Pam G


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
